title: Leading trends in food items on restaurant menus in the U.S. 2018
summary: This statistic shows the Category trends food items restaurant menus in the U.S. in 2018 .
The survey revealed that 69 % of the respondents trends New_cuts_of_meat_(e.g._shoulder_tender_oyster_steak_Vegas_Strip_Steak_Merlot_cut) Category food items the Leading .
